name: The CHALLENGE (DEMO)
description:
The Challenge is a unique rougelite platformer.

This is just a small demo for the game I am making right now.

Right now the demo has 10 levels with one boss.

The final product will have:

-50 levels

-5 bosses

-A bunch of new mechanics and art

- New Music

-A real ending

-Soul
It is going to be a while before the final product is somewhat done. I am just releasing this to see how people feel about it and to gain feedback.
